Selling EG T5: +5 Mana Flaring witchwood runestaff with illthorn grip

2
Mogonis
Tuesday, January 16th, 2018, 11:58:54 AM

Delivery to Landing area or FWI preferred. Buyout offers will be entertained.

satin-wrapped witchwood runestaff with a red-streaked illthorn grip +20 3 lbs +5 Mana flares (the maximum)

The harmonics generated tell you that the runestaff has been infused with mana, resulting in the caster gaining 5 mana when occassionally casting spells.

https://gswiki.play.net/Mana_flare

Mana flares are unique in being able to trigger when casting defensive, or even utility spells like Purification Song (1004), and mass effect attack spells such as Song of Depression (1015) or Song of Sonic Disruption (1030). The bardsongs will only trigger the flare with the CAST verb (i.e. initial start of the Song); the RENEW verb will not trigger a flare.

+5 Mana is super rare and unlikely to occur outside of pay events. It cost at least 75,000 bloodscrip to go from 0-5 Mana using certificates at prior Duskruin events.

MB: 5m CB: 11m madmartigan (GBB)
